resources.string: An error occurred while loading data. Try later.

This is an application that will help you determine which areas of your life need to be pumped in order to achieve harmony. 

Firstly, let's determine your current level. 

Do not rush to answer, be honest with yourself. 

Swipe right ->
How many points would you rate your relationship with your loved one, close people, family?
How many points would you rate your well-being? Do you play sports? What is your attitude towards health?
I try to take care of myself
I don\'t take care of my health
How many points would you rate your relationship with parents, children, relatives, close friends?
How many points would you rate your income, assets? How well do you understand finance?
Place of work, professional skills, career growth
How many points would you rate your place of work, professional skills, career growth?
I feel like it\'s not mine
The brightness of life, communication, travel, entertainment, sleep
How many points would you rate the brightness of your life, communication, travel, entertainment, sleep quality?
Sometimes I burn out, I don\'t get enough rest
Rarely able to escape to rest
Realization of potential, hobby, personal development
How many points would you rate the realization of your potential, hobbies, personal development?
It\'s hard to do just one thing
How many points would you rate your emotions, state of mind? Do you practice meditation?\n\nAfter all ratings, click "Save"

This graph shows which areas of your life are already at a good level, and which areas need to be pumped.

To make the wheel round, you need to align the values - reduce the importance of one or do something in other areas. Keep regular entries in the diary section. So you can clearly see the results.

Each time you add an event to your diary, you gain or lose points towards your current level. For example, I did exercises - plus 0.1 to health. Closed an important deal - plus 0.1 to work. Etc

Every day, with due effort, the wheel will straighten its edges more and more. That\'s the point of Get Better.

Do not forget to regularly multiply bright events and do not neglect areas that require attention.
Incredible!\nThe sphere has been worked out to the maximum.\nNow you can pay attention to other spheres.
Enter the text of the entry
This is where your diary posts will be. Each of them will pump your wheel of life. Try adding the first entry

string-array.name: faq_title
string-array.item: Why should I value my areas of life?
How to make a recurring task?
What to expect in the future?

string-array.name: faq_text
string-array.item:
Here you get 3 strategic advantages over yesterday's self:

 1. You roughly imagined for yourself what 10 out of 10 is in a particular area 

2. You realized that there is room to develop and grow, what to improve right now 

3. You saw which areas you lag behind the rest, and this does not allow you to be completely perfect

Remember what 10 out of 10 is for the area you are setting a goal for. 

Now visualize it. What can you do today to make this picture/feeling a little closer to you in reality? 

If you dream of perfect health, your goal could be "run a marathon in 2022", or anything that brings you closer to your desired 10 out of 10. 

We recommend that you move towards your goal in stages, like "run 5 km in 30 minutes", then "run 10 km in 55 minutes". So you will have a feeling of victory much more often, and this is an insanely important component of moving forward.

To do this, you can select the date of the first execution and select the record type "habit", specifying the repetition interval. 

When a "habit" is completed, it will reappear on the desired date. 

We already know how to make this more convenient and will include it in future updates, including the ability to select days of the week.

Start by rating all areas of your life from 1 to 10 on a satisfaction scale. 

1 means you are very dissatisfied, it couldn't get any worse, and 10 is an ideal, almost unattainable, but still possible. 

You can also create your own spheres of life by customizing the wheel for yourself.

When creating or editing a post, you may notice a slider. Here you can choose whether the recording improves, worsens or does not affect the performance of your area of life. \n\nThe indicator changes according to the selected difficulty level in the settings.

Let's take us as an example: for us, 10 out of 10 in Career is "Get Better use more, Facebook feed for an hour, we have a huge office in the heart of Silicon Valley, we have helped more than 1 billion people live the life they want, and launched powerful wave. 

This is not a goal, give yourself free rein, this is your beacon, you can dream big here. At the same time, 10 out of 10 in the Friends realm might sound like "2 real friends we see every week." 

You get the idea, 10 depends on your ambitions in this area, and individually for you personally.
A lot of everything. Follow our updates in the telegram group or write to the developers personally. You can find this functionality on the settings screen.

resources.string: Post notes 3 days in a row
Post notes 7 days in a row
Only 1 tracker can be active at a time
Create a new area of interest
GetBetter is an app that helps you determine which spheres you need to improve in order to achieve harmony.
Look out for the next update!
Habits that have not yet been completed are displayed here.\n\nHold a habit for 3 seconds to close it.

In order to develop your wheel of life, you need to add entries about your life to the diary.\n\nThese can be goals, habits, ordinary entries describing bright events, or tracking time for some event.
This is the wheel of life, showing your progress. \nYou can change them, delete them, or add your own.
For example, morning exercises, a chapter of a book was read, a new acquaintance
If you enjoy using "GetBetter", please take a moment to rate it.
I am the architect of my life.
I am the creator of my reality.
My willingness to forgive starts the process of my healing. I allow the love of my heart to wash, cleanse and heal every part of my body. I know that I am worthy (worthy) of healing.
I accept and love myself the way I am.
Forgiving myself and others frees me from the past. Forgiveness is the solution to almost all problems. Forgiveness is my gift to myself. I forgive and release.
I am healthy, energetic and full of happiness.
I AM DEEPLY SATISFIED WITH EVERYTHING I DO
Every moment of the day is special for me as I follow my higher instincts and listen to my heart. I am calm (calm) in my world and my affairs.
Everything in my life will lead to something good.
I am getting wiser every day.
I TRUST THE FLOW OF LIFE
Life flows smoothly and rhythmically, and I am part of it. Life supports me and brings me only good and positive experiences. I believe that the flow of life will bring me the highest good.
I am grateful for everything that happens in my life.
I HAVE THE PERFECT LIVING SPACE
I see myself living (living) in a wonderful house. He fulfills all my desires and satisfies all my needs. It\'s in a great location and costs what I can easily afford to pay.
Everything I\'m looking for, I find.
I CAN RELEASE THE PAST AND FORGIVE EVERYONE
I free myself and everyone in my life from old grudges. They are free and I am free (free) to move on to a new wonderful experience.
I love myself and feel great.
POWER IS ALWAYS FOCUSED IN THE PRESENT MOMENT
The past is forgotten and has no power over me. I can be free right this moment. Today\'s thoughts create my future. I control everything and regain my power. I\'m calm and free
Today I give up my negative thoughts in favor of positive ones.
I gladly meet challenges and my potential to cope with them is limitless.
I AM CALM, IT\'S JUST A CHANGE
I overcome all obstacles with joy and ease. What has been lived develops into a wonderful new experience. My life is getting better and better.
I forgive everyone who hurt me in the past.
I want to get rid of old negative beliefs. What blocks my path are just thoughts. My new thoughts are positive and creative.
I believe that I can do everything.
THIS IS JUST A THOUGHT, A THOUGHT CAN CHANGE
I am not limited by thoughts of the past. I choose my thoughts carefully. A new understanding constantly comes to me, and I learn to look at the world in a new way. I want to change and develop.
Today, I am filled with positive energy.
MY EVERY THOUGHT CREATES MY FUTURE
The Universe fully supports every thought I choose and believe in. I have an unlimited choice of my thoughts. I choose balance, harmony and peace, and I express them in my life.
I am a wonderful person because I am me.
I am free from the urge to blame anyone, including myself. We all try to make the best use of our knowledge, understanding and awareness.
My attitude towards myself depends only on me and no one else.
I sail through life easily and with love. I love myself. I know that at every turn of life, only good things await me.
I focus my energies on what is important to me.
I readily forgive. I breathe love into my vision and look at everything with compassion and understanding. My clear understanding is reflected in my vision of the world.
Every day I get closer to the (that) me that I want to become.
I FEEL AT PEACE IN THE UNIVERSE AND LIFE LOVES AND SUPPORTS ME
I breathe in the fullness and richness of life. I enjoy watching how generously life supports me and gives me much more goodness than I can imagine.
I try to learn something new every day.
The people in my life are actually my reflection. It gives me the opportunity to grow and change.
Today I am one step closer to my goal.
I BALANCE THE MALE AND FEMALE IN MYSELF
The masculine and feminine principles of my being are in perfect balance and harmony. I am calm (calm) and everything is fine.
My thoughts do not control me, I control my thoughts.
I am free in my thinking and can only choose good thoughts. I rise above the limitations of the past and gain freedom. Now I become everything that I was created for.
I DROP ALL FEARS AND DOUBTS
Now my choice is to free myself from all destructive fears and doubts. I accept myself and create peace in my soul and heart. I\'m loved and protected
I am different from others, so I will be successful in my own way.
All this day they help me make a choice. Divine intelligence constantly guides me in achieving my goals. I am calm.
Today my mind and heart are open to everything new.
My birthright is to live fully and freely. I give life exactly what I want to receive from life. I am happy that I live. I love life!
I know that I can achieve anything I want.
I create peace in my soul and my body reflects my peace of mind in the form of perfect health.
I can. I will do. And point.
I TURN EVERY PIECE OF MY EXPERIENCE INTO AN OPPORTUNITY
Every problem has a solution. All my experience provides me with opportunities to learn and grow. I am calm.
My feelings are in my power, and today I choose to be happy.
I am open to everything new and changeable. Every moment provides a wonderful new opportunity to get closer to who I am. I go with the flow of life easily and freely.
NOW I RISE ABOVE THE FEARS AND LIMITATIONS OF OTHER PEOPLE
My decision creates my experience. I am not limited in my ability to create goodness in my life.
It\'s hard for me right now, but it won\'t last forever.
I don\'t have to try to earn love. I am worthy of love because I exist. The people around me reflect my own love for myself.
I\'m not afraid to make mistakes.

I say "Out!" any negative thought that comes into my brain. No person, no place, no thing has power over me, since I am the only creator of my thoughts. I create my reality and everything that is in it.
I\'m strong enough to rewrite my history.
I LIVE IN THE WORLD WITH MY SEXUALITY
I enjoy my sexuality and my body. My body is perfect for me in this life. I hug myself with love and compassion.
I LIVE IN THE WORLD WITH MY AGE
Each age has its own special joys and experiences. My age is always perfect for a given place in my life.
It\'s a new day. A day I\'ve never lived before. I stay in the present and enjoy every moment of it.
Self love is my natural state.
I AM RELEASED FROM ALL CRITICISM
I give only what I want to receive in return. My love and approval come back to me every moment of my life.
My body deserves my respect and care.
I let others experience what matters to them and I am free to create what matters to me.
I don\'t let my fears control me.
I SEE MY PARENTS AS LITTLE CHILDREN IN NEED OF LOVE
I sympathize with my parents\' childhood. Now I know: I chose them, because they were perfect for what I should was to learn. I forgive and release them, and free myself.
Where others see a problem, I see an opportunity.
MY HOME IS A QUIET SHELTER
I bless my home with love. I bring love to every corner, and my house lovingly responds with warmth and comfort. I feel good and peaceful here.
There are no obstacles that I cannot overcome.
WHEN I SAY YES TO LIFE, LIFE SAYS YES TO ME
Life reflects my every thought. As long as I keep a positive mindset, Life gives me only good experiences.
Time is the most valuable thing I have, and I treat it carefully.
THERE IS ENOUGH FOR EVERYONE, INCLUDING ME
The Ocean of Life is abundant and generous. All my needs and desires are met before I can ask. Good comes to me from everywhere, and from everyone, and from everything.
I see every day as an opportunity to change something for the better.
EVERYTHING IS WELL IN MY WORLD
Everything in my life is going right, now and always.
Life created me to realize my potential. I trust Life and Life always protects me. I\'m safe.
Now I live in boundless love, light and joy. All is well in my world.
I OPEN NEW DOORS TO LIFE
I am happy with what I have, and I know that new experiences are always ahead of me. I welcome the new with open arms. I believe that life is wonderful.
I CLAIM MY POWER AND CREATE MY OWN REALITY WITH LOVE
I ask you to give me more understanding in order to consciously and lovingly build my world and my experience.
NOW I\'M CREATING A GREAT NEW JOB

I am completely open and receptive to a wonderful new position. I will be able to use my talents and creativity to work in a wonderful place, with the people and for the people I love. I will earn good money.

Now I am establishing a new understanding of success for myself. I know that I can achieve success and my success will be the way I imagine it to be. I enter the Circle of Winners. Brilliant opportunities open up to me everywhere. I attract prosperity in all areas of life.
I DESERVE THE BEST AND I ACCEPT THE BEST NOW
My thoughts and feelings give me everything I need to enjoy a life full of love and success. I deserve all the blessings because I was born into the world. I lay claim to my goods.
Everything I need to know at any given moment is revealed to me. I believe in myself and I believe in life. Everything is already good.
I AM COMPLETELY APPROPRIATE FOR ANY SITUATION
I am one with the energy and wisdom of the universe. I draw this energy and it is easy for me to defend myself.
